content:
Great! Here's a final draft with the title "Bull vs. Bear: Two Guys, One Whatsapp Group, No Clue" incorporated into the summary:

Introducing "Bull vs. Bear: Two Guys, One Whatsapp Group, No Clue" - the new investing podcast where two old friends argue about investment ideas, despite having no real clue what they're talking about. Michael thinks the world is going to fall in and you should have your money in cash, while Billy thinks markets will have ups and downs and you just need to stay invested for the long term and ignore the news. Despite their lack of expertise, their lively debates are based on real-life experiences and backed by their own research, which can be amusing and insightful.

Join Michael and Billy as they share their misadventures in personal finance and try to convince each other that their investment strategies are the right way to go. With their unique blend of humor, camaraderie, and financial missteps, this podcast is sure to entertain and perhaps even inspire you to start investing - or to avoid it altogether.

So, if you're looking for a lighthearted take on personal finance, and want to hear two friends argue about topics they're not qualified to discuss, then tune in to "Bull vs. Bear: Two Guys, One Whatsapp Group, No Clue".
